long_description: The Mammut Gravity Classic 10.2mm x 60m Rope has great all-around handling characteristics for sport and trad climbing at your local crag. 10.2mm diameter stands up to regular use at the crag, yet keeps the rope light enough to be carried in to climbs that require an approach hike. Kernmantle design combines durable braided sheath and shock-absorbent core for protection from fall forces. 60m length allows long leads and rappels. Middle of the rope is marked with a black bar to facilitate rappels. Mammut Gravity Classic 10.2mm x 60m Rope meets UIAA tests for falls, impact force and elongation.
short_description: The Mammut Gravity Classic 10.2mm x 60m Rope has great all-around handling characteristics for sport and trad climbing at your local crag.
